xxl.core.xml.relational.dom
Class Dom

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.xml.relational.dom.Dom

public abstract class Dom
extends Object

This class consists of static methods that support some database functionality, such as XML to MetaDataCursor and vice versa, on XML.

Note: The XMLParser has to be inititialized before the first usage.


The following table shows the structure of a identifier map which is used to configure the XML processing in some methods.
The values are editable. The methods recognize only the values according the following keys. Therefore the keys shouldn't be manipulated.
By the way, this map is equal to the map created by the method Dom.DEFAULT_IDENTIFIER_MAP().

key value explanation
meta meta notation of the meta tag in the XML Code, if no entry exists, then no metadata will be written
data data If no entry exists, then no data will be written. The data tag doesn't occur in the XML Code.
metacol col The notation of the column tags between the meta tag.
datarow row The notation of the rows tags. The row tags aren't ingrained in an extra data tag.
datacol col The notation of the column tags between the datarow tags.
sqltype sqltype The notation of the sqltype attribute from each metacol.
precision precision The notation of the precision attribute from each metacol.
scale scale The notation of the scale attribute from each metacol.
autoincrement autoincrement The notation of the autoincrement attribute from each metacol.
currency currency The notation of the currency attribute from each metacol.
nullable nullable The notation of the nullable attribute from each metacol.
signed signed The notation of the signed attribute from each metacol.

Method Detail

init

public static void init(XMLParser parser)
Initializes the XMLParser.

Parameters:
parser - an XMLParser object

DBtoDOM

public static void DBtoDOM(MetaDataCursor cursor,
                           Document document,
                           String dataXPath)
Inserts data from a java.sql.MetaDataCursor into a document. An Xpath Expression indicates where the data has to be inserted. A default identifier map will be used. Writes the metadata at the same place as the data. (use a new identifier map and remove the meta entry to write no metadata).

Parameters:
cursor - MetaDataCursor
document - document in which the data should be inserted
dataXPath - A XPath Expression

DBtoDOM

public static void DBtoDOM(MetaDataCursor cursor,
                           Document document,
                           String dataXPath,
                           Map identifierMap)
Inserts data from a java.sql.MetaDataCursor into a document. An Xpath Expression indicates where the data has to be inserted. Writes the metadata at the same place as the data. (remove the meta entry from the identifier map to write no metadata).

Parameters:
cursor - MetaDataCursor
document - document in which the data should be inserted
dataXPath - A XPath Expression
identifierMap - A user specified identifier map

DBtoDOM

public static void DBtoDOM(MetaDataCursor cursor,
                           Document document,
                           String dataXPath,
                           String metadataXPath,
                           Map identifierMap)
Inserts data from a java.sql.MetaDataCursor into a document. An Xpath Expression indicates where the data has to be inserted. Writes the metadata at the same place as the data. (remove the meta entry from the identifier map to write no metadata).

Parameters:
cursor - MetaDataCursor
document - document in which the data should be inserted
dataXPath - A XPath Expression
metadataXPath - A XPath Expression
identifierMap - A user specified identifier map

DBtoDOM

public static void DBtoDOM(MetaDataCursor cursor,
                           Document document,
                           String dataXPath,
                           String metadataXPath,
                           Map identifierMap,
                           boolean nullable)
Inserts data from a java.sql.MetaDataCursor into a document.

Parameters:
cursor - a MetaDataCursor
document - a DOM document
dataXPath - an Xpath expression, which describes the location where to put the data
metadataXPath - an Xpath expression, which describes the location where to put the metadata
identifierMap - a map which describes the layout of the XML code
nullable - if nullable is set false, then instead of SQL null values, an empty string will be added to the document

DOMtoMetaDataCursor

public static XMLMetaDataCursor DOMtoMetaDataCursor(Document document,
                                                    String XPathtoData)
Tries to extract data from the document. The XPath expression describes the location of the data/metadata. Returns a MetaDataCursor. Default metadata and the default identifier map will be used.

Parameters:
document - The document
XPathtoData - This XPath expression describes the location of the data
Returns:
A MetaDataCursor containing the data

DOMtoMetaDataCursor

public static XMLMetaDataCursor DOMtoMetaDataCursor(Document document,
                                                    String XPathtoData,
                                                    String XPathtoMetadata)
Tries to extract data from the document. The XPath expression describes the location of the data/metadata. Returns a MetaDataCursor. The dafault identifier map will be used.

Parameters:
document - The document
XPathtoData - This XPath expression describes the location of the data
XPathtoMetadata - This XPath expression describes the location of the metadata
Returns:
A MetaDataCursor containing the data

                                                    String XPathtoData,
                                                    String XPathtoMetadata,
                                                    Map identifier)

XPathtoData - This XPath expression describes the location of the data
XPathtoMetadata - This XPath expression describes the location of the metadata

DOMtoMetaDataCursor

public static XMLMetaDataCursor DOMtoMetaDataCursor(Document document,
                                                    String XPathtoData,
                                                    String XPathtoMetadata,
                                                    String[] SQLTypes,
                                                    Map identifier)
Tries to extract data from the document. The XPath expression describes the location of the data/metadata. Returns a MetaDataCursor.

Parameters:
document - The document
XPathtoData - This XPath expression describes the location of the data
XPathtoMetadata - This XPath expression describes the location of the metadata
SQLTypes - A stringlist containing the sqltype-names which are used in the document
identifier - A map containing the notation of attributes and tags
Returns:
A MetaDataCursor containing the data

Returns:

DEFAULT_IDENTIFIER_MAP

public static Map DEFAULT_IDENTIFIER_MAP()
This Method creates a (Hash)Map which can be used to configure the XML generation. It can also be used to configure the generation of XMLResultSets.
  • <meta> indicates the metadata
  • <col> indicates the columns, occurs in <row> an in <meta>
  • <row> indicates a row
The attributes:
  • sqltype
  • precision
  • scale
  • autoincrement
  • currency
  • nullable
  • signed

Returns:
Map

DEFAULT_HTML_IDENTIFIER_MAP

public static Map DEFAULT_HTML_IDENTIFIER_MAP()
This is a configuration Map which provides the generation of html code.

Returns:
Map
